key.copyMessage.noFormatting.toggle.tool: Enable/Disable removing formatting when copying messages, relevant for older servers that use formatting codes.
chatPlus.title: ChatPlus
chatPlus.chatSettings.title: Chat Settings
chatPlus.chatSettings.tooltip: Change chat settings similar to vanilla Minecraft.
chatPlus.chatSettings.chatTextSize.toolt: Changes the chat text size. This does not effect width/height.
chatPlus.chatSettings.maxMessages.toolti: The maximum number of messages to store. Minecraft's default is 100. Increasing this will increase memory usage.
chatPlus.chatSettings.maxCommandSuggesti: The maximum number of commands to suggest. Minecraft's default is 10. The suggestions might go past your screen height.
chatPlus.chatSettings.textOpacity.toolti: Changes the opacity of the chat text.
Changes the opacity of the chat background.
chatPlus.chatSettings.lineSpacing.toolti: Changes the spacing between lines of text in chat.
Changes the way timestamps are displayed in over messages in chat.
chatPlus.chatKeyBinds.tooltip: Hold down bound keys while chat is focused to perform actions.
chatPlus.chatTabs.title: Chat Tabs
Enables/Disables scrolling left/right to cycle through tabs.
chatPlus.chatTabs.arrowCycleTabEnabled.t: Enables/Disables using the left/right arrow keys to cycle through tabs.
chatPlus.chatTabs.name: Name
chatPlus.chatTabs.pattern.tooltip: Regex Pattern (Based on Raw Text, No style/formatting)
chatPlus.chatTabs.autoPrefix.tooltip: Text to prepend when sending messages in this tab.
chatPlus.filterHighlight.title: Filter Highlights
chatPlus.filterHighlight.tooltip: Customize what messages are highlighted in chat.
chatPlus.filterHighlight.toggle.tooltip: Enables/Disables the highlighting filter messages in chat.
chatPlus.filterHighlight.pattern.tooltip: Regex Pattern (Based on Raw Text, No style/formatting)
chatPlus.hoverHighlight.title: Hover Highlight
chatPlus.hoverHighlight.toggle.tooltip: Enables/Disables highlighting the text line your mouse is over.
chatPlus.hoverHighlight.color.tooltip: Changes the color of the hover highlight.
chatPlus.screenShotChat.title: Screenshot Chat
chatPlus.screenShotChat.tooltip: Click to take a screenshot of the chat. 3s Cooldown.
chatPlus.screenShotChat.toggle.tooltip: Enables/Disables being able to take a screenshot of the chat.
chatPlus.translator.title: Translator
chatPlus.translator.match.tooltip: Regex Pattern that matches chat messages to translate.
chatPlus.translator.senderNameGroupIndex: Group index of the sender's name in the regex pattern.
chatPlus.translator.translateSelf.toolti: Language to use when translating your own messages.
chatPlus.translator.translateSpeak.toolt: Language your messages are translated to.
Language your messages are translated to. Click to toggle.
chatPlus.translator.translateSpeakPrefix: Text to prepend that will not get translated.
chatPlus.chat.find.tooltip: Click to toggle the find option. Control Click on any message to jump to it.
